author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D., Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
title: Christian Post Decries NY Mayor de Blasio’s ‘Reckless’ Threat to Close Churches
description: A leading Christian journal has accused New York Mayor Bill de Blasio of overstepping his authority by threatening to permanently close synagogues and churches that fail to comply with his ban on public gatherings.
content:
A leading Christian journal has accused New York Mayor Bill de Blasio of overstepping his authority by threatening to permanently close synagogues and churches that fail to comply with his ban on public gatherings.
